name: soundStrider
description:
Close your eyes and picture a world that you can only hear. Its lush environments are teeming with synthesized sounds that evoke colorful and imaginative images. Exploration rewards you with mysteries to solve and contemplative places to revisit for meditation, studying, or sleep.

This is soundStrider—part exploration game, psychedelic walking simulator, ambient music generator, and relaxation tool.

Features

  • Binaural modeling
  • Procedurally generated soundscapes
  • Adventure mode for guided play
  • Free Roam mode for casual play
  • Bookmarks for revisiting and sharing favorite locations
  • Screen reader and keyboard accessibility
  • Dynamic open-eye visuals
